translation.homeDesc2: For the first time, you can get Pfizer-Biontech (mRNA) covid19 vaccine using this website.
translation.homeDesc3: Reserve hotel in the beautiful city of istanbul with us and get vaccinated in your hotel.
translation.homeSlide1: Tourists can now receive a dose of the Pfizer-BioNTech vaccine while enjoying their stay at Istanbul’s best hotels. After the first dose, you can receive a QR-coded vaccination card issued by the Turkish health ministry, and by getting the second dose, you’re eligible to receive the EU health pass.
translation.homeSlide2: The Pfizer-BioNTech vaccine is available in vials of 6 shots. After opening the vial, all six shots should be injected and cannot be kept for later use. In a case where the total number of vaccines that you want is six or a multiple of 6, you can request vaccination at your desired place of stay. Our support team will contact you to set a vaccination appointment.
translation.homeSlide3: Customers can be provided with Fast Track.
translation.homeInfoDesc2: Select your hotel and vaccine type
translation.homeInfoDesc3: Enter your contact info, including your ٍEmail and Phone number (with active WhatsApp)
translation.homeDoseDesc2: Upload your documents, including your passport photo
translation.homeDoseDesc3: Enter your check in date and finalize your order
translation.homeDoneDesc1: You can check your order status using the “my orders” menu
translation.homeDoneDesc2: You will be contacted by support team.
translation.orderTitle: Please fill all the required information
translation.resultText: A Verification link was Sent to the Email mentioned above. Please click on the Link to activate your account and proceed.
translation.vaccineTitle: You need to select the hotel and the number of nights you want to book and stay in it.
translation.name: Name
translation.vaccineDesc: * We provide fast track service for those who choose Istanbul New Airport as their destination without extra charges.
translation.connectionError: Error connecting to server. Please check your Internet connection.
translation.flightInfoNote: * Please enter your check in date.
translation.otpMessage: An activation code has been sent to your Email. Please enter the code below, or click on the link sent to your email to view your profile.
translation.stepOneDesc: You need to enter the personal information of the guests (in English). If you want to register more than one guest, click on 'Add Another Guest' button.
translation.stepThreeDesc: You need to provide valid contact information including Mobile Number and Email Address. Please note that you need to verify your email in the next step.
translation.loginOtpDesc: An OTP has been sent to your Email. Please enter the code to login. You can also use the login link in the Email.
translation.paymentDesc: Here is an overview of your booking. Please check the information and proceed to next step.
translation.completeOrderDesc: In this step, you need to complete your order by uploading the passport image of the guests and entering your flight information and check in date.
translation.dose1Info: Hotel is booked successfully. You will be contacted by support for coordination.
translation.dose2SetInfo: You have successfully received your first dose. Please enter your flight information to book your second dose.
translation.dose2Info: You have successfully booked your second dose. You need to arrive at the selected vaccination center on the date mentioned below
translation.doseDoneInfo: You have successfully received your vaccination. Here's your order summary.
translation.propossedText: Proposed date for receiving second dose:
translation.offlineTitle: If you don’t have the ability to pay online, you can make an offline payment by going one of the following exchange stores. You just have to provide the following Payment ID.
translation.getExchangesError: Error in getting the list of exchange stores
translation.passportExpiryValidation: Passport is either expired or will be expired soon
translation.birthDateValidation: Birth Date cannot be in future
translation.waitingForPayDescription: To finalize your order, you have to make the payment.
translation.usdtStep1Text: First, you have to transfer the payable amount (in USDT) to our wallet with the address below on TRON blockchain (TRC20):
translation.usdtStep2Text: After finalizing the transaction, please enter the transaction ID (64 characters) in the box below and click on “I Paid”:
translation.usdtPaymentMessage: Please wait while payment is being verified... You will be redirected to the success page once the payment is confirmed. For support, please contact 908507000700 on WhatsApp.
translation.profilePaymentStep1DisabledButtonTooltip: You need to upload the passport images of the guests
translation.haveNotReceivedTheCodeYet?: Have not received the code yet?
translation.confirmOrder: Your order will be finalized and you may not make changes. Are you sure you want to proceed?
